comment.author: 67587725@N02
comment._content: On the right edge lower side the tenement on the corner of Bristo Place and Teviot Place can be seen. The line of Lothian Street is now a roadway. See the link for a 1960s view from where the photograph was taken. The Corner Bar - known in the 60s as the Lothian Bar? is on the right edge of the photo on the link. www.flickr.com/photos/sixtiesedinburgh/6971720848/in/set-...
